column4: anyone experiencing problems when doing upgrades with flashplayer-nonfree hanging up the update process?
seems everytime I do an upgrade the thing stalls
it probably can't download the archive.
yes indeed.. I have tried using the flashplayer-update cmd and that gives and error
can't recall off  the top of my head..
make sure you don't have a proxy set for wget connections. Check with 'env | grep -i proxy' and look in /etc/wgetrc
no, it's not set if there is a # at the beginning of the line
if there is a http_proxy or similar variable set, do 'export http_proxy=' before the upgrade
okay, then proxy settings aren't what's causing the trouble.
I just wgetted a pic from my webserver
gotta go. Hope you can fix it.
unzip unpacks the file to the current dir, you just need to give it the full path to the zipfile.
I don't think there is a -e option. -d should work, though.
